regen.absent_element: ensure grade details are exclusively accessible to relevant users
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that grade details, averages, and overall scores are only accessible to authorized users, maintaining user privacy.
The system shall ensure that only authorized users can access grade information such as assignment grades, averages, and overall scores.

regen.absent_element: ensure grade details are only accessible to relevant users
regen.new_specification: The system shall restrict access to grade information, including assignment grades, averages, and overall scores, to authorized users, such as course administrators and the corresponding students.

label: No other actor should be able to view another one's grades except the course administrator.
absence: no mention of prohibiting anyone other than administrators from viewing others' grades
